1.0.6.name: wordpress/easy-affiliate
1.0.6.description:
This plug-in is the fastest, simplest, and easiest way to turn your product review blogs into a source of income -without the hassle and frustration of an affiliate back-office. Use it on your WordPress blog or website. The plug-in automatically turns all of your links into affiliate links to make you cash from over 3000 affiliate partners.

Now you can make money automatically from your blog. Just blog normally, and any link is turned into a personal affiliate link, earning you money.

GET STARTED NOW

Download

It's Simple to Earn Affiliate Cash on your blog

With the plug in installed, you simply blog normally and earn affiliate cash from any of our 3000 partner sites. Download

How it works:
1. Download and activate the plug-in.
2. The plug automatically changes
